question: How long have you lived in the neighborhood?
What do you like most about living around here?
Do you have any favorite coffee shops or lunch spots nearby?
Have you found any hidden gems in the neighborhood—like parks, bakeries, or walking trails?
Are there any neighborhood events you look forward to each year?
Do you know any local babysitters you'd recommend?
Where do you usually grocery shop around here?
Have you found a favorite playground for your kids?
Is there a good local place to get your hair done or pamper yourself?
Have you met many other parents around here?
How old are your kids?
Are you doing daycare, preschool, or staying home right now?
What’s your favorite way to spend a weekend with your family?
Do your kids have favorite books or shows right now?
How do your kids do with naps and bedtime these days?
Are there any parenting hacks you swear by?
What’s your go-to snack for your kids on the go?
Have you ever done a mom group or parenting class around here?
What’s something your kid is really into right now?
Do you ever do family outings into the city (or nearest metro area)?
What do you do for work—or what would you do if you had endless time?
What’s a hobby or activity you enjoy when you actually get a little time for yourself?
Are you reading anything good right now?
What kind of music or podcasts do you like to listen to?
Have you watched any good shows or movies lately?
If you could plan a kid-free weekend, what would you do?
Do you cook much? Any go-to easy meals?
What’s your favorite way to relax after a long day?
Do you like to travel? Got any dream destinations?
Are you more of a morning person or a night owl?
How did you meet your partner (if partnered)?
What did you think life with kids would be like before becoming a parent?
What’s something motherhood has taught you about yourself?
How do you usually handle stress or tough days?
What kind of traditions or routines are important in your family?
Do you celebrate any specific holidays in a meaningful way?
How do you and your partner (or support system) divide responsibilities at home?
Do you have extended family nearby?
What kind of values are you hoping to instill in your kids?
How do you usually celebrate your birthday—or your kids’?
What’s your go-to coffee or tea order?
If someone gave you a free afternoon, what would you do with it?
Do you like board games, card games, or puzzles?
If you could live anywhere for a year, where would it be?
Do you prefer beach days or mountain getaways?
What's your idea of a perfect night out with friends?
Are you into any creative outlets—writing, art, crafts, music?
Do you ever daydream about starting a business or switching careers?
What's the last thing that made you laugh really hard?
What’s something people might not guess about you?
